articles.author: Stephen Luntz
articles.title: The Periodic Table Has Been Sonified And Every Element Sounds Unique - IFLScience
articles.description: Be warned, you probably won’t like how some elements sound.
articles.content: The unique radiation emitted by heated or electrified elements has been converted into sound, enabling us to hear the distinctive chord each element produces. Although the idea has been tried before,… [+3561 chars]
